name: Super Benji Land
description:
DISCLAIMER

This is a non profit product designed for fans of The Super Benji Channel or Just Mario Romhack Fans. This is a ROM for The Gameboy and will only work on GB,GBC ,GBA or a GB Emulator

Also Keep in mind that if you're in the overworld or in the space suit the sprites are still Mario. Don't worry I'll change it

Super Benji Land Is a ROMHack of Super Mario Land 2 that Replaces Mario with Former Pro Wrestler and current YouTube Gaming Star Benji as he travels through The Mario Land 2 World
